title: Cable Network Survey
question_text: A large cable network is planning a survey of $180$ of their own subscribers to learn more about their preferences in television programs. Which of the following is NOT required in order for this to be a well-designed survey?

choices.text: Every customer should have an equal chance to be selected as part of the sample.
The network should secure that every possible subgroup of 180 customers 180 customers should have the same chance of being chosen as the sample.
The subjects should all be customers for this cable network.
The wording of the survey question should be the same for all subjects.
Randomness should be used in the selection of the subjects.
